title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6171.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6171.1 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part shall apply to the funding of programs providing services to
eligible witnesses and to families of eligible witnesses to the extent
appropriate to achieve or maintain their security. (b) Funds available for disbursement pursuant
to this Part shall include those funds appropriated by the State Legislature
and funds received by the State from any public or private agency or person, including the Federal government for the purposes of crime witness protection
program services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6171.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
